name: End Transmission (Downloadable version)
description:
END TRANSMISSION

A cowboy's final vignette

Created for the Space Cowboy Game Jam by Nick Cummings

Description

End Transmission is a first-person narrative exploration game that attempts to capture a brief, significant moment in a character's timeline.

Controls

  • Move the mouse to look around.
  • Left-click on objects and points of interest to interact.
  • Right-click or spacebar to zoom back out.
  • Control the ship's computer by following the on-screen prompts.
  • Return or Enter can be used to accept confirmation prompts.
  • Escape to quit.

Credits

See you space cowboy...
